name: Delve Delve Limitation
description:
Delve deep into the Dungeon fighting off monsters while the Dungeon holds you back.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 with the theme : Out Of Control.

My idea was Inverse DDR.

When the icons turn red that control is disabled.

When the icons turn green that control is forcefully enabled.

Controls:

WASD / Arrows  --- Move

SPACE / LEFT CLICK --- Melee Attack (HOLD to Charge Attack)

ENTER / RETURN --- Shoot

LEFT CTRL --- Shield

Art Assets acquired from:

Simple Vector Icons by Unruly Games

2D UFO Tutorial by Unity Technologies
